title: Zenland
author: Zenland
created_time: April 05, 2023, 11:17:57 AMLast edit: April 16, 2023, 01:00:47 PM by Zenland
content: Hey Bitcointalk community!We are excited to announce a special contest by Zenland, a platform for no-code smart contract creation. We're giving you the opportunity to win a .bnb ENS domain for just 1 cent! 😱🔥 Contest Details 🔥For the month of April, we'll be holding a contest where one person every day can get a 5-digit (or longer) .bnb ENS domain for just 1 cent. To participate, you'll need to create a smart contract using the Zenland platform.Here's how it works:Visit our marketplace at https://zen.land/@ZenlandLook for the contest item, which will appear randomly throughout the day on Zenland's profile marketplace.Create a smart contract for the item and be the first to complete the transaction.After securing your .bnb name, head over to https://space.id and select your desired .bnb name (it should be available and at least 5 digits long).Remember, only one winner per day, so keep an eye on our marketplace and act fast!⚠️ Please Note ⚠️To avoid high deployment fees, we advise participants to use Gnosis, Fantom, or Polygon networks while creating the smart contract.🌐 For more information about Zenland and this contest, follow us on Twitter (@zenland_app) and join our Telegram group.Don't miss your chance to win a .bnb ENS domain for just 1 cent! Best of luck to everyone participating in the contest, and we look forward to seeing you on Zenland!Let's get this party started! 🚀 🎉

comments.author: Zenland
comments.body: Hey Bitcointalk community! 🎉We have some exciting news regarding our ongoing Zenland contest! 🚀We've decided to add .eth and .arb domain names to the mix, giving you even more chances to secure a fantastic ENS domain for just 1 cent! 😱🔥 Updated Contest Details 🔥For the entire month of April, participants now have the opportunity to win not only .bnb but also .eth and .arb ENS domains for just 1 cent. Remember to act fast as there's only one winner per day!Here's a quick reminder of how to participate:Visit our marketplace at https://zen.land/@ZenlandLook for the contest item, which will appear randomly throughout the day on Zenland's profile marketplace.Create a smart contract for the item and be the first to complete the transaction.After securing your ENS domain, head over to https://space.id and select your desired name (it should be available and at least 5 digits long).⚠️ Important Note ⚠️Please use Gnosis, Fantom, or Polygon networks while creating the smart contract to avoid high deployment fees.Stay updated on the contest by following us on Twitter (@zenland_app) and joining our Telegram group.Don't miss this amazing opportunity to get a .bnb, .eth, or .arb ENS domain for just 1 cent! Best of luck to everyone participating in the contest, and we can't wait to see you on Zenland!The party continues! 🎊🚀

comments.author: Zenland
comments.body: 🔥🔥 Introducing the Newest Addition to Zenland's 1¢ Giveaways: Real Domain Names for Just 1¢! 🔥🔥Hello BitcoinTalk community! We're back with another fantastic contest from Zenland, and this time, we're giving away REAL domain names for just 1¢! 🎉 Contest Details 🎉For a limited time, Zenland is offering a unique opportunity for participants to secure a real domain name for only 1¢! Choose from a list of 200 different domain extensions!Here's how to participate:1. Visit Zenland's official 1¢ shop at https://zen.land/@Zenland2. Find the 1¢ domain name item and click "Buy Now."3. Choose a suitable network and stablecoin, and complete the transaction.4. After successfully purchasing the item, create an account on Namecheap.5. Choose an available domain name and send the registered Namecheap email address to the contract chat on Zenland.6. Zenland will register the domain for 1 year and transfer ownership to your Namecheap account.⚠️ Please Note ⚠️Only one domain per person can be purchased at the 1¢ price.To avoid high deployment fees, we advise participants to use Gnosis, Fantom, or Polygon networks while creating the smart contract.For more information about Zenland and this contest, follow us on Twitter (@zenland_app) and join our Telegram group.🌐 Domain Extensions:.africa, .agency, .art, .asia, .autos, .baby, .bar, .bargains, .beauty, .best, .bid, .bike, .bio, .biz, .blog, .blue, .boats, .bond, .boston, .boutique, .buzz, comments.author: Diornov
comments.body: As the founder of Zenland, I wanted to personally extend a special offer to you all. To promote our platform and show our appreciation for the community, I'm offering a limited number of $10 Amazon Gift Cards for just 1¢. This isn't a scam or a catch; you will indeed receive the gift card once you complete the transaction on Zenland.I'm doing this to showcase Zenland's features and to encourage people to explore and experience our platform. If you're interested in grabbing this deal, just visit our Zenland 1¢ Shop, and follow the instructions to secure your $10 Amazon Gift Card for only 1¢.Remember, this is a limited-time offer, and I'm doing it out of goodwill to promote our project. Feel free to check it out and spread the word if you find it interesting. Thank you for your support!P.S. Once in a while I will be adding this types of items into the Zenland 1c shop. Soon I will add a Steam Gift Card, 10$ of WrappedBTC and some limited edition of NFT. Keep an eye on Zenland.
